body_html:
@ckalas You are using clang which does not support -zmuldefs. (clang is symlinked as gcc on MacOS, and bazel is not smart enough to try and identify the compiler)
You have two options:
Install gcc and rerun ./configure, selecting the correct compiler
or
rerun ./configure and select clang as the compiler.

body:
@ckalas You are using clang which does not support -zmuldefs. (clang is symlinked as gcc on MacOS, and bazel is not smart enough to try and identify the compiler)
You have two options: 
Install gcc and rerun ./configure, selecting the correct compiler
or
rerun ./configure and select clang as the compiler.
